title.rendered: TTE & Danfoss celebrate World Refrigeration Day

content.rendered:
Technical & Trading Est. (TTE) along with longstanding partners, Danfoss came together to celebrate World Refrigeration Day. The highly interactive event for select customers, that also saw full attendance from both TTE and Danfoss teams, laid emphasis on effective energy saving solutions in refrigeration as well as delved into the legalities of counterfeit products in the market, how to identify them, and the measures that can be taken to curb such cases.

Industry and product experts from both TTE and Danfoss such as Dilip Kumar Sharma (Executive VP – TTE), Aleksandar Jovanovic (Senior Sales Director – Danfoss), Suresh Kumar (Regional Manager Middle East – Danfoss) and Abier Wasouf (Regional Anti-counterfeit Counsel – Danfoss) were key speakers at the event. Held at the Sheraton Dubai Creek Hotel, the sessions ended with a gala dinner, with opportunity to network.
